summary: A young doctor on his way across the country to a job interview crashes his car in a small town and is sentenced to work for several days at the town hospital.
cast: Michael J. Fox|Julie Warner|Barnard Hughes|Woody Harrelson|David Ogden Stiers|Frances Sternhagen|George Hamilton|Bridget Fonda|Mel Winkler|Helen Martin|Roberts Blossom|Tom Lacy|Macon McCalman|Raye Birk|Eyde Byrde|William Cowart|Amzie Strickland|Time Winters|K.T. title: Doc Hollywood
